name: AI Shipathon - School Invite (Intro)
subject: Invite for {{school_name}} –AI Competition (Aug 30–Sept 1)
content:
Dear {{contact_person}},

Hope you're doing well. I'm Rishul from Maximally, and I’m reaching out to invite {{school_name}} to participate in an exciting global event — the Maximally AI Shipathon, happening August 30 to September 1.

This is a 48-hour beginner-friendly AI competition open to all school students (solo or teams). Students can build creative AI-powered projects — no coding experience needed.

Here’s what makes it special:

Judged by mentors from OpenAI, Google, Meta, and Apple

Cash prizes, certificates, and LORs for winners

Students from DPS, Vivek High, Ryan International participated in past editions

📍 Event Info: maximally.in/shipathon
📄 One-Pager Deck: View Here
📝 Nomination Form: Fill This

If {{school_name}} would like to send a few students, simply fill the nomination form or reply to this email. We'll handle the rest.

Looking forward to having your students onboard!

Warm regards,
Rishul Chanana
Founder, Maximally
📞 +91 9041260790
📧 hello@maximally.in
🌐 maximally.in/shipathon

content_html:
Dear {{contact_person}},

Hope you're doing well. I'm Rishul from Maximally, and I’m reaching out to invite {{school_name}} to participate in a unique global event — the Maximally AI Shipathon, happening August 30 to September 1.

This is a 48-hour beginner-friendly AI competition open to all school students (solo or in teams). Students can build creative AI-powered projects — no coding experience needed.

Why it's worth sharing with your students:

  • Judges from OpenAI, Google, Meta, Apple and more
  • Cash prizes, certificates, and Letters of Recommendation for winners
  • Past participants from DPS, Vivek High, Ryan International and others
  • Beginner-friendly, creative tracks for coders and non-coders alike

Quick Links:

  • 📍 Event Website
  • 📄 One-Pager Deck
  • 📝 Nomination Form
  • 🖼️ Event Poster

If {{school_name}} fills out the form, we’ll also feature your school on our official Wall of Progressive Schools — a public showcase of institutions supporting future-focused learning.

We’d love to have your students join us. Just fill the nomination form or reply to this email — we’ll handle the rest.

Warm regards,
Rishul Chanana
Founder, Maximally
📧 hello@maximally.in
🌐 maximally.in/shipathon
